title: Excellent Peeth
review: To reach the main entrance of this peeth or temple,devotees need to climb a flight of seven steps.Unique design of the temple enables the deity to be visible for Darshan right from the moment devotees enter the main gate.The temple has pillars made of marble that are ornamented.

title: Same as other place
review: This place I did not find anything extraordinary. Very less people come here. If you have ample then go to this place.

title: Peeth
review: Mandir shri nimbak peeth is good religious place. peaceful place of Ajmer. This peeth is nice tourist place.

title: Religious Place
review: Mandir Shri Nimbark Peeth is a nice religious place in the holy city of Ajmer. This place is frequently visited by tourists
